definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="File" id="info">info</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="file_variable"><field name="isDirectory">FALSE</field><value name="file"><block type="variables_get_file"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:info</field></block></value><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">wobr-config-info.toml</field></block></value><value name="location"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="2"></mutation><value name="ADD0"><block type="get_game_directory"></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">config</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="write_txt"><value name="var"><block type="variables_get_file"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:info</field></block></value><statement name="text"><block type="write_line"><field name="newLine">TRUE</field><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"># IMPORTANT</field></block></value><value name="var"><block type="variables_get_file"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:info</field></block></value><next><block type="write_line"><field name="newLine">TRUE</field><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"># This file is for reference only</field></block></value><value name="var"><block type="variables_get_file"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:info</field></block></value><next><block type="write_line"><field name="newLine">TRUE</field><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"># For 1.15 version, you will find right configuration file in your save under "serverconfig" folder</field></block></value><value name="var"><block type="variables_get_file"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:info</field></block></value><next><block type="write_line"><field name="newLine">TRUE</field><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"># Do not delete it, it can cause crash</field></block></value><value name="var"><block type="variables_get_file"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:info</field></block></value><next><block type="write_line"><field name="newLine">TRUE</field><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"># If you did, then head back to CurseForge, config file will be linked</field></block></value><value name="var"><block type="variables_get_file"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:info</field></block></value><next><block type="write_line"><field name="newLine">TRUE</field><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"># Config file updates itself each time it gets development change, so there's no need to delete it yourself</field></block></value><value name="var"><block type="variables_get_file"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:info</field></block></value><next><block type="write_line"><field name="newLine">TRUE</field><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"># CONFIG REFRESHING</field></block></value><value name="var"><block type="variables_get_file"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:info</field></block></value><next><block type="write_line"><field name="newLine">TRUE</field><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"># Config file execution is once player joins the server</field></block></value><value name="var"><block type="variables_get_file"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:info</field></block></value><next><block type="write_line"><field name="newLine">TRUE</field><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"># Meaning you can refresh it by relogging the player, no need to reload the server</field></block></value><value name="var"><block type="variables_get_file"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:info</field></block></value><next><block type="write_line"><field name="newLine">TRUE</field><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"># ----------------</field></block></value><value name="var"><block type="variables_get_file"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:info</field></block></value><next><block type="write_line"><field
